metadata.title: CVE-2022-22739 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Malicious websites could have tricked users into accepting launching aprogram to handle an external URL protocol. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 91.5, Firefox < 96, and Thunderbird < 91.5.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
